lines.text: So- Slick's got that hole in him, right?
Yeah, good catch, there. What about it?
I mean... our story's only got one gunshot in it.
How do we get two bullet holes if there's only one gunshot?
Well, I dunno, but the landlord only reported a single shot. That part ain't up for debate.
Well, I think we can probably come back to that later.
It's pr-probably just an old wound anyway. Or! Or a s-sore or something, from the burning.
Yeah, um, it doesn't look like that, but... you're the dubiously-trustworthy forensics expert, I guess.
